targets.expr: topk($topk, sum(rate(mongo_wt_cache_read_into_bytes{db=~"$db", coll=~"$coll", instance=~"$instance", role=~"$role", rs=~"$rs", idx=~"", coll=~".+"}[$scale])) by (db, coll))
-topk($topk, sum(rate(mongo_wt_cache_written_from_bytes{db=~"$db", coll=~"$coll", instance=~"$instance", role=~"$role", rs=~"$rs", idx=~"", coll=~".+"}[$scale])) by (db, coll))
topk($topk, sum(rate(mongo_wt_cache_read_into_bytes{db=~"$db", coll=~"$coll", instance=~"$instance", role=~"$role", rs=~"$rs", idx=~".+"}[$scale])) by (db, coll, idx))
-topk($topk, sum(rate(mongo_wt_cache_written_from_bytes{db=~"$db", coll=~"$coll", instance=~"$instance", role=~"$role", rs=~"$rs", idx=~".+"}[$scale])) by (db, coll, idx))
topk($topk, sum(delta(mongo_collection_count{db=~"$db", coll=~"$coll", instance=~"$instance", role=~"$role", rs=~"$rs"}[$scale])) by (db, coll))
sum(delta(mongo_wt_cache_used_bytes{db=~"$db", coll=~"$coll", instance=~"$instance", role=~"$role", rs=~"$rs", idx=~"", coll=~".+"}[$scale])) by (db, coll)

panels.title: WT Cache Usage Rate by Collections (Bytes/s)

targets.expr: sum(delta(mongo_wt_cache_used_bytes{db=~"$db", coll=~"$coll", instance=~"$instance", role=~"$role", rs=~"$rs", idx=~".+"}[$scale])) by (db, coll, idx)

panels.title: WT Cache Usage Rate by Indexes (Bytes/$scale)

targets.expr: avg(mongo_wt_cache_used_bytes{db=~"$db", coll=~"$coll", instance=~"$instance", role=~"$role", rs=~"$rs", idx=~"", coll=~".+"}) by (db, coll)

topk($topk, sum(mongo_collection_storage_size_bytes{db=~"$db", coll=~"$coll", instance=~"$instance", role=~"$role", rs=~"$rs"}) by (db, coll))

topk($topk, sum(delta(mongo_collection_storage_size_bytes{db=~"$db", coll=~"$coll", instance=~"$instance", role=~"$role", rs=~"$rs"}[$scale])) by (db, coll))
sum(delta(mongo_collection_storage_size_bytes{db=~"$db", coll=~"$coll", instance=~"$instance", role=~"$role", rs=~"$rs"}[$scale]))

sum(delta(mongo_collection_storage_size_bytes{db=~"$db", coll=~"$coll", instance=~"$instance", role=~"$role", rs=~"$rs"}[$scale]))
topk($topk, avg(mongo_collection_count{db=~"$db", coll=~"$coll", instance=~"$instance", role=~"$role", rs=~"$rs"}) by (db, coll))

topk($topk, avg(mongo_collection_size_bytes{db=~"$db", coll=~"$coll", instance=~"$instance", role=~"$role", rs=~"$rs"} / mongo_collection_storage_size_bytes{db=~"$db", coll=~"$coll", instance=~"$instance", role=~"$role", rs=~"$rs"}) by (db, coll))
